using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.NewTypes.Input
{

	/// <summary>
	/// Derives from <see cref="Inheritance"/>
	/// </summary>
	public class DerivedAsync : Inheritance
	{
		private Type _type = typeof(DerivedAsync);
		private Type _baseType;

		public DerivedAsync()
		{
			_baseType = typeof(Inheritance);
		}

		public override void Read()
		{
			if (SyncMethod())
			{
				SimpleFile.Read();
			}
			else
			{
				Read2();
			}
		}

		public Task Read2Async()
		{
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
		}

		public void Read2()
		{
			SimpleFile.Read();
		}
	}
}
